result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerard Anthony Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Armed Robbery, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Gerber

ADDRESS INFO for Jerard Anthony Edwards
Current: 1907 Wisconsin Ave, Beloit, WI 53511 United States  (Effective: 12-17-2019)
Prior: 5706 S. Justine St., Chicago, IL 60636

IT IS ORDERED that the Department of Corrections will effectuate the change from Confinement to Extended Supervision upon receipt of this order, determining the actual number of days served in Confinement and changing the remaining Confinement to Extended Supervision. The number of days that are converted from Confinement Time to Extended Supervision will be determined by a DOC records office staff member and will be based upon actual release Date.
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Warden/Superintendent of the institution to which the prisoner is assigned shall effect his or her release upon receipt of this order.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jerard Anthony Edwards in court in custody with attorney Lane Fitzgerald.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court orders:
1)  1 year Rock Co Jail; 9 days RCJ in lieu of $443 costs, consecutive to sentence, concurrent with ct 2 and any other sentence now serving.
2)  4 years WSP, 12 years ES; concurrent with count 1 and with any other sentence; 464 days sentence credit; DOC collect restitution and surcharges; 11 days RCJ in lieu of $528 costs, consecutive to ct 1 but concurrent with any other sentence now serving.  Not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program; eligible for Substance Abuse Program.  Felon warnings advised.
Sentencing hearing at 12-03-2015 01:00 pm

Defendant Jerard Anthony Edwards in court in custody with attorney Lane Fitzgerald.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No contest plea to count 1, Court finds defendant guilty.  Guilty plea to count 2, Court finds defendant guilty.  State not victim compliant, continue.  Defendant to remain at Rock Co Jail.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Waupun Correctional Institution
